{{cpp/ranges/slide_view/title|''sentinel''}}
{{cpp/ranges/slide_view/navbar}}

{{ddcl|since=c++23|notes={{mark expos}}|
class /*sentinel*/;
}}

The return type of {{rlpt|end|slide_view::end}} when the underlying view is not a {{lconcept|common_range}}.

The {{c|/*sentinel*/}} is used only when {{c|/*slide-caches-first*/&lt;V&gt;}} is {{c/core|true}}.
